page.title: 07Morag's Diary,Cortachy
page.content:
{Friday,17th May,1985. }
First in the morning we finished our Maths book,then I started Mental Arithmetic.We had a short playtime before the photographer arrived.He took the family photos inside the school, and the school group in the teacher's garden.After this we had our lunch.It was cold meat,roast potatoes and salad,then banana milk shake and biscuits. In the afternoon we finished our work and afterwards listened to a story on the radio called 'The Enchanted Whistle.'Our last subject today was Art.We were doing Batik with wax and dye.We are making an umbrella for the play in the school concert.The play is 'Anansi and the Sky God.'
